name: mousseline
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a sweet or savoury dish made by mixing foods with cream and sometimes egg into a soft, light mixture: a mousseline of white chocolate A small crab mousseline is served alongside the fish. Mousselines can be prepared in advance and don't take long to cook. Synonym
mousse
[ U ] (also mousseline sauce) a thin sauce made by adding cream or egg white to hollandaise sauce (= a sauce made from egg yolks and butter): The poached salmon with mousseline sauce was beautifully cooked. The fish was served with peas and mint mousseline.
More examplesFewer examplesThe duck was served with a potato and garlic mousseline.Divide the mousseline mix between the buttered moulds.I've topped these mousselines with caviar.The fish is better with sauce mousseline than hollandaise.
